attributes.action: Demand that Alastair Darling repay the 75p of taxpayers money he used to purchase a carrier bag
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Surely the Chancellor of the Exchequer can afford to buy his own carrier bags, rather than charge the tax payer 75p. And in any case, are we not being encouraged to reduce the amount of carrier bags we use due to global warming.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
